selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the diagram and identify geometric properties or relations.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine spatial relationships between labeled points in the diagram.

selected_skills.name: identify_geometric_shapes_in_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To identify geometric shapes present in the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to detect and classify geometric shapes such as squares in the diagram.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_square_value_from_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: To calculate the value of a square using geometric properties and relations from a diagram.
edge_cases: Labels do not correspond to any geometric shape
